column2: title=<small>Christie's 20th Century Books and Manuscripts 16 November 2001</small>

column1: '''''Christie's 20th Century Books and Manuscripts 16 November 2001''''' is an auction catalogue from Christie's (London). Two Tolkien-related lots are included:
*The description for Lot 20 includes extracts from a [[Letter to George Sayer (28 November 1963)
column2: letter to George Sayer dated 28 November 1963]].

column1: *The description for Lot 21 includes extracts from letters to George Sayer and his wife Moira, dating from [[Letter to George and Moira Sayer (7 August 1952)
column3: to Moira Sayer, 10 August 1952]]) through to [[Letter to George and Moira Sayer (11 December 1971)
column4: 11 December 1971]]. The lot also includes proof copies (corrected by Tolkien) of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' and [[Essays and Studies (1953)
column5: ''Essays and Studies'' (1953)]], together with various first edition copies of books by Tolkien.

column1: Part of the 1963 letter and an annotated page from the proof copy of ''[[The Return of the King]]'' are reproduced in photographs.<ref>{{webcite
